The Token credentials generated by using the \* `@azure/ms-rest-nodeauth` library. It can be one of the following: - ApplicationTokenCredentials - UserTokenCredentials - DeviceTokenCredentials - MSITokenCredentials Token audience (or resource in case of MSI based credentials) to use when creating the credentials is https://servicebus.azure.net/
